name: Project Endless
description:
This is a 2 week prototype work on a 90s style shooter for an end-project assignment on programming course at Lexicon in Malmö - Sweden.

The objectives of the game: Find 3 buttons on the map to unlock all doors on the end arena.

This game was made by Christian Karlsson Korbacz & Björn Vandevelde.

All assets in this project are CC0 except for those made by the developers.

This is a prototype only so bugs are to be expected.
